original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices down 6-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices fell by 6 percent from a week ago at an auction on Thursday, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts fell to 78,225.84 from 83,219.45 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority on March 30.
The highest price was 85,000 rupees for 1,000 nuts down from the previous week’s 92,500 rupees, while the lowest was 74,000 also up from 76,500 rupees.
The auction offered 1,122,984 coconuts and 780,932 nuts were sold. (Colombo/April2/2023)
